name: Fire Bolt
descr: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes fire damage.

name: Ray of Frost
descr: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

data.saveEffect: Speed reduced by 10 ft until start of your next turn

name: Shocking Grasp
descr: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing metal armor. On a hit, the target takes lightning damage and can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

data.saveEffect: Target can't take reactions until start of its next turn

name: Gust
descr: You seize the air and compel it to create one of the following effects: push a creature, push an object, or create a harmless sensory effect.

name: Sacred Flame
descr: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a DEX save or take radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this save.

name: Chill Touch
descr: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

data.saveEffect: Can't regain HP until start of your next turn

name: Mage Hand
descr: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand can manipulate objects, open doors, retrieve items, and perform other simple tasks.

name: Burning Hands
descr: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in the area must make a DEX save. A creature takes fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Ice Knife
descr: You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice exploded must succeed on a DEX save or take cold damage.

data.saveEffect: No cold damage from explosion on success

name: Thunderwave
descr: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in the area must make a STR save. On a failed save, a creature takes thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

data.saveEffect: Half damage and not pushed on success

name: Healing Word
descr: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Inflict Wounds
descr: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage.

name: Shield
descr: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you gain +5 Defense, including against the triggering attack.

name: Fireball
descr: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a DEX save. A target takes fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

components.materialDescription: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

name: Lightning Bolt
descr: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a DEX save. A creature takes lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

components.materialDescription: A bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

name: Fly
descr: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft.

components.materialDescription: A wing feather from any bird
